projectDescription: Remote-Talk is a web conferencing application for online meetings and video conferences.
features: Authentication and Authorization: Remote Talk has a secure user authentication system with JWT tokens.
Responsive Design: Remote Talk is designed with a responsive interface for optimal user experience on different devices.
Meeting Features: Remote Talk allows users to create meetings with features such as virtual hand-raising, screen sharing, and live streaming.
Chat System: Remote Talk has a built-in messenger system for communication outside of meetings.
Profile Editing: Remote Talk users can edit their profiles and send friend requests.
Feedback System: Remote Talk has an option for users to provide feedback on the application.

projectDescription: CarUp is a comprehensive and secure car service website that offers a range of services to users.
features: Authentication system: CarUp includes a secure authentication system to ensure that only authorized users can access the website.
Services: The website offers a range of car services, which users can browse and select from based on their requirements.
Payment gateway: The website integrates with a payment gateway to enable users to make payments for the services they order conveniently.
Email sender: CarUp includes an email sending feature, which can be used to communicate important updates and notifications to users.
Admin dashboard: Admins have access to a dashboard where they can add and manage engineirs, as well as oversee the overall functioning of the website.
User dashboard: Users have their own dashboard, which displays the status of their orders and allows them to manage their orders accordingly.
Support system: The website includes a support system, where engineirs can provide assistance to users and address their queries and concerns.
Technology: Other tools and libraries: Netlify, React-hook-form,

projectDescription: HeaEasy is a comprehensive car buy and sell website with features such as user authentication, live chat, and a reporting system.
features: HeaEasy is a car buy and sell website with three user types: buyers, sellers, and admins.
Buyers can browse and purchase cars listed on the website, leave reviews, and report any issues with the cars.
Sellers can add and sell cars on the website, and can also manage their listings and transactions.
Admins have access to a range of tools to manage the website, including approving and deleting seller accounts, adding and deleting car listings, and managing hold systems.
HeaEasy features a live chat system and allows users to share their experiences with others.
Technology: Other tools and libraries: Netlify, React-hook-form,
Other tools and libraries: Netlify, React-hook-form,
